section.name: POI Objects Exposed
section.p: During transformation, the current POI Sheet object is exposed in the beans map as the bean name "sheet". Also, the entire POI Workbook object is exposed in the beans map as the bean name "workbook". This allows for Expressions that set "off sheet" properties such as the Header, Footer, and PrintSetup.

Because some of these examples call methods with a return type of "void", the Expressions themselves that do so evaluate to null and the cells that contain them will be blanked out. Note: JEXL Expressions allow String literals to be enclosed in single quotes.
